data.Sentence_cn: 如果你赢了很多钱你要会做什么？
data.Sentence: What will you do if you win a lot of money?

data.Sentence_cn: 待在最好的饭店。
data.Sentence: Stay at the best hotels.

data.Sentence_cn: 如果我赢了很多钱，我将待在最好的饭店。
data.Sentence: If I win a lot of money, I'll stay at the best hotels.

data.Sentence_cn: 如果他错过了公共汽车他将怎么办？
data.Sentence: What will he do if he misses the bus?

data.Sentence_cn: 坐出租车。
data.Sentence: Take a taxi.

data.Sentence_cn: 如果他错过了汽车他将坐出租车。
data.Sentence: If he misses the bus, he'll take a taxi.

data.Sentence_cn: 如果他没卖掉旧车他将怎么办？
data.Sentence: What will he do if he doesn't sell his old car?

data.Sentence_cn: 他将不会买新车。
data.Sentence: He won't buy a new one.

data.Sentence_cn: 如果他不能卖了他的旧汽车，他将不买新车。
data.Sentence: If he doesn't sell his old car, he won't buy a new one.

data.Sentence_cn: 如果他们支付你很多钱你会做什么？
data.Sentence: What will you do if they offer you more money?

data.Sentence_cn: 减少工作量。
data.Sentence: Work less.

data.Sentence_cn: 如果他们支付我很多钱，我就减少我的工作。
data.Sentence: If they offer me more money, I'll work less.

data.Sentence_cn: 如果她不打信他会怎样做？
data.Sentence: What will he do if she doesn't type the letter?

data.Sentence_cn: 自己打。
data.Sentence: Type it himself.

data.Sentence_cn: 如果她不打信他会自己亲自打。
data.Sentence: If she doesn't type the letter, he'll type it himself.

data.Sentence_cn: 如果他们早回家孩子们会做什么？
data.Sentence: What will the children do if they come home early?

data.Sentence_cn: 在花园玩。
data.Sentence: Play in the garden.

data.Sentence_cn: 如果孩子们回家早，他们会在花园玩。
data.Sentence: If the children come home early, they'll play in the garden.

data.Sentence_cn: 如果明天你生病了你会做什么？
data.Sentence: What will you do if you are ill tomorrow?

data.Sentence_cn: 我不会去工作。
data.Sentence: I won't go to work.

data.Sentence_cn: 如果我明天生病了我将不会去上班。
data.Sentence: If I am ill tomorrow, I won't go to work.

data.Sentence_cn: 如果你去参加聚会，你会做什么？
data.Sentence: What will you do if you go to the party?

data.Sentence_cn: 玩得愉快些。
data.Sentence: Enjoy myself.

data.Sentence_cn: 如果我去了聚会，我会玩的很愉快。
data.Sentence: If I go to the party, I'll enjoy myself.

data.Sentence_cn: 如果他问你会怎么做？
data.Sentence: What will you do if he asks you?

data.Sentence_cn: 和他说实话。
data.Sentence: Tell him the truth.

data.Sentence_cn: 如果他问我，我会告诉他实话。
data.Sentence: If he asks me, I'll tell him the truth.

data.Sentence_cn: 如果明天下雨，他们会做什么？
data.Sentence: What will they do if it rains tomorrow?

data.Sentence_cn: 呆在家里。
data.Sentence: Stay at home.

data.Sentence_cn: 如果明天下雨，他们将呆在家里。
data.Sentence: If it rains tomorrow, they'll stay at home.
